text:
The rrule test got me confused:
```rrule_test(f, ȳ, (x, x̄)...;```
I have two arguments to my function, a first one I don't differentiate, and then a vector: f(::DummyStruct, v)
How should I structure the input to `rrule_test` ?

text:
